com.palantir.giraffe.file.base

Class CopyFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palantir.giraffe.file.base.CopyFlags

  • public class CopyFlags
extends Object
    Container for standard CopyOptions.

    This class may be extended by file system implementations that add custom options. Use setStandardOption(CopyFlags, CopyOption) to set standard options in custom subclasses.

    See Also:
    StandardCopyOption, LinkOption

      • setStandardOption

        protected static boolean setStandardOption(CopyFlags flags,
                                           CopyOption option)
        Sets a standard option in flags.
        Parameters:
        flags - the flags object in which to set the option
        option - the standard option to set
        Returns:
        true if the option was recognized and set or false if the option was non-standard.
